title: Student Union President 2026
description: Election for the next Student Union President. The president represents all students and leads the Student Union Executive Council.

candidates.name: Ahmed Okonkwo
candidates.manifesto: I promise to fight for better facilities, more student events, and improved cafeteria services.

candidates.name: Zainab Ibrahim
candidates.manifesto: My focus is on mental health support, academic excellence, and building a stronger community.

title: VP Academic Affairs 2026
description: Election for Vice President of Academic Affairs. Responsible for representing student academic interests.

candidates.name: David Chen
candidates.manifesto: I will push for curriculum updates, more lab hours, and better industry partnerships.

candidates.name: Maria Santos
candidates.manifesto: Academic support programs, tutoring services, and research opportunities for all.
